name: LoL-Iris
body:
![Iris Logo](http://i.imgur.com/rvFDvpC.png)
# the LoL Communicator
[Download Beta .ZIP Here](https://github.com/RitoSaltworks/lol-iris/archive/master.zip)

## The radial-menu-driven, in-game-overlain, contextual, Riot-API-enabled, completely customizable chat macro system, named for the Greek goddess of comms (and rainbows)

An open source project from K pot's

![](http://i.imgur.com/a25sm40.png)![](http://i.imgur.com/UgprqaI.png)![](http://i.imgur.com/QdvRpvg.png)

![](http://i.imgur.com/0di2dds.jpg)![](http://i.imgur.com/e9iLowl.jpg)![](http://i.imgur.com/8qcviBq.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
